verses.verse: וַיַּ֖עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Moreover the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִיּ֗וֹב <S%H347><s%> Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

הֲ֭רֹב <S%H7378><s%> Shall he that contendeth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with שַׁדַּ֣י <S%H7706><s%> with the Almighty יִסּ֑וֹר <S%H3250><s%> instruct מוֹכִ֖יחַ <S%H3198><s%> [him]? he that reproveth אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> God יַעֲנֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H6030><s%> let him answer פ
וַיַּ֖עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אִיּ֥וֹב <S%H347><s%> Then Job אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold קַ֭לֹּתִי <S%H7043><s%> Behold I am vile מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> what אֲשִׁיבֶ֑ךָּ <S%H7725><s%> what shall I answer יָ֝דִ֗י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand שַׂ֣מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> thee? I will lay לְמוֹ־ <S%H3926><s%> upon פִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> my mouth

אַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> Once דִּ֭בַּרְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> have I spoken וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nothing אֶֽעֱנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> but I will not answer וּ֝שְׁתַּ֗יִם <S%H8147><s%> yea twice וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nothing אוֹסִֽיף׃ <S%H3254><s%> but I will proceed no further פ

וַיַּֽעַן־ <S%H6030><s%> Then answered יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ אִ֭יּוֹב <S%H347><s%> unto Job [מִן כ] [סְעָרָה כ] (מִ֥ן <S%H4480><s%> at ק) (סְעָרָ֗ה <S%H5591><s%> storm ק) וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

אֱזָר־ <S%H247><s%> Gird up נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Now כְגֶ֣בֶר <S%H1397><s%> now like a man חֲלָצֶ֑יךָ <S%H2504><s%> thy loins אֶ֝שְׁאָלְךָ֗ <S%H7592><s%> I will demand וְהוֹדִיעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3045><s%> of thee and declare

הַ֭אַף <S%H637><s%> really תָּפֵ֣ר <S%H6565><s%> Wilt thou also disannul מִשְׁפָּטִ֑י <S%H4941><s%> adversary תַּ֝רְשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <S%H7561><s%> condemn לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of תִּצְדָּֽק׃ <S%H6663><s%> me that thou mayest be righteous
וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or זְר֖וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> Hast thou an arm כָּאֵ֥ל ׀ <S%H410><s%> God לָ֑ךְ וּ֝בְק֗וֹל <S%H6963><s%> with a voice כָּמֹ֥הוּ <S%H3644><s%> like תַרְעֵֽם׃ <S%H7481><s%> thunder

עֲדֵ֥ה <S%H5710><s%> Deck נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> with גָֽא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> thyself now [with] majesty וָגֹ֑בַהּ <S%H1363><s%> and excellency וְה֖וֹד <S%H1935><s%> thyself with glory וְהָדָ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> and beauty תִּלְבָּֽשׁ׃ <S%H3847><s%> and array

הָ֭פֵץ <S%H6327><s%> Cast abroad עֶבְר֣וֹת <S%H5678><s%> the rage אַפֶּ֑ךָ <S%H639><s%> of thy wrath וּרְאֵ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> and behold כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone גֵּ֝אֶ֗ה <S%H1343><s%> every one [that is] proud וְהַשְׁפִּילֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H8213><s%> and abase

רְאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> Look כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone גֵּ֭אֶה <S%H1343><s%> on every one [that is] proud הַכְנִיעֵ֑הוּ <S%H3665><s%> [and] bring him low וַהֲדֹ֖ךְ <S%H1915><s%> and tread down רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> the wicked תַּחְתָּֽם׃ <S%H8478><s%> where

טָמְנֵ֣ם <S%H2934><s%> Hide בֶּעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> them in the dust יָ֑חַד <S%H3162><s%> together פְּ֝נֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6440><s%> their faces חֲבֹ֣שׁ <S%H2280><s%> [and] bind בַּטָּמֽוּן׃ <S%H2934><s%> in secret

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I אוֹדֶ֑ךָּ <S%H3034><s%> Then will I also confess כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> can תוֹשִׁ֖עַ <S%H3467><s%> can save לְךָ֣ יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> unto thee that thine own right hand

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now בְ֭הֵמוֹת <S%H930><s%> Behold now behemoth אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> which I made עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> well חָ֝צִ֗יר <S%H2682><s%> grass כַּבָּקָ֥ר <S%H1241><s%> as an ox יֹאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> with thee he eateth

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now כֹח֣וֹ <S%H3581><s%> Lo now his strength בְמָתְנָ֑יו <S%H4975><s%> [is] in his loins וְ֝אֹנ֗וֹ <S%H202><s%> and his force בִּשְׁרִירֵ֥י <S%H8306><s%> [is] in the navel בִטְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H990><s%> of his belly

יַחְפֹּ֣ץ <S%H2654><s%> He moveth זְנָב֣וֹ <S%H2180><s%> his tail כְמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like אָ֑רֶז <S%H730><s%> like a cedar גִּידֵ֖י <S%H1517><s%> the sinews [פַחֲדֹו כ] (פַחֲדָ֣יו <S%H6344><s%> stone ק) יְשֹׂרָֽגוּ׃ <S%H8276><s%> are wrapped together

עֲ֭צָמָיו <S%H6106><s%> His bones אֲפִיקֵ֣י <S%H650><s%> [are as] strong נְחוּשָׁ֑ה <S%H5154><s%> pieces of brass גְּ֝רָמָ֗יו <S%H1634><s%> his bones כִּמְטִ֥יל <S%H4300><s%> [are] like bars בַּרְזֶֽל׃ <S%H1270><s%> of iron

ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> He רֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> He [is] the chief דַּרְכֵי־ <S%H1870><s%> of the ways אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> of God הָ֝עֹשׂוֹ <S%H6213><s%> he that made יַגֵּ֥שׁ <S%H5066><s%> to approach חַרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2719><s%> his sword

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ב֭וּל <S%H944><s%> food הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> Surely the mountains יִשְׂאוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> bring him forth ל֑וֹ וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> where all the beasts הַ֝שָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field יְשַֽׂחֲקוּ־ <S%H7832><s%> play שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> Under צֶאֱלִ֥ים <S%H6628><s%> under the shady trees יִשְׁכָּ֑ב <S%H7901><s%> He lieth בְּסֵ֖תֶר <S%H5643><s%> in the covert קָנֶ֣ה <S%H7070><s%> of the reed וּבִצָּֽה׃ <S%H1207><s%> and fens

יְסֻכֻּ֣הוּ <S%H5526><s%> cover צֶאֱלִ֣ים <S%H6628><s%> The shady trees צִֽלֲל֑וֹ <S%H6752><s%> him [with] their shadow יְ֝סֻבּ֗וּהוּ <S%H5437><s%> compass him about עַרְבֵי־ <S%H6155><s%> the willows נָֽחַל׃ <S%H5158><s%> of the brook

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> If יַעֲשֹׁ֣ק <S%H6231><s%> Behold he drinketh up נָ֭הָר <S%H5104><s%> a river לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> is not יַחְפּ֑וֹז <S%H2648><s%> [and] hasteth יִבְטַ֓ח ׀ <S%H982><s%> not he trusteth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> though יָגִ֖יחַ <S%H1518><s%> that he can draw up יַרְדֵּ֣ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his פִּֽיהוּ׃ <S%H6310><s%> into his mouth
בְּעֵינָ֥יו <S%H5869><s%> it with his eyes יִקָּחֶ֑נּוּ <S%H3947><s%> He taketh בְּ֝מֽוֹקְשִׁ֗ים <S%H4170><s%> snares יִנְקָב־ <S%H5344><s%> pierceth through אָֽף׃ <S%H639><s%> [his] nose
